title: Email Marketing: Effective Email Marketing: The Ultimate Guide to Monetizing Your Email Marketing Strategy
description: This book is 99c for a limited time only! Pick up your copy today!With a bit of technical know-how anyone can learn how to do email marketing. However, like everything in business it will only be effective with the right strategy! Effective Email Marketing guides you in both the technical and tactical aspects of building a successful email marketing strategy. You will learn how Email Marketing can measurably and significantly contribute to your bottom line and what scams to avoid in the process. As a successful online entrepreneur himself, Sam A, Brown will show you how to do it right the first time and avoid the common mistakes and traps that many entrepreneurs fall into when it comes to email marketing.
author: Sam A. Brown
